summary: Making the college a little more visually pleasing.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center]

This mod aims to make the college of Winterhold kinder to the eyes by adding new and improved textures while still mainting the original look as much as possible.

All textures are double the resolution of the vanilla high res pack (2048^2 max).

Enjoy!


[color=5ea2e5][b]Installation[/b][/color]
[center][/center]

As any texture file, simply unpack the .rar file and merge the data folder with the one in your Skyrim directory.

To uninstall, remove these files from the winterhold folder in [u]Data/textures/architecture/winterhold:[/u]

winterholdbanner01.dds
winterholddoor01.dds
winterholddoor01_n.dds
winterholddoor02.dds
winterholddoor02_n.dds
winterholdfloor01.dds
winterholdfloor01_n.dds
winterholdfloor02.dds
winterholdfloor02_n.dds
winterholdgate01.dds
winterholdgate01_n.dds
winterholdrubble01.dds
winterholdrubble01_n.dds
winterholdwall01.dds
winterholdwall01_n.dds
winterholdwall02.dds
winterholdwall02_n.dds
winterholdwindow01.dds
winterholdwindow01_n.dds
winterholdwindow02.dds
winterholdwindow02_em.dds

You could of course also use the Nexus mod manager.

[center]
[/center]
author: Anarin
